channel.title: Sf on Who wonders ponders
channel.description: Recent content in Sf on Who wonders ponders

item.title: Hourly wage rate for domestic help in Austria
item.description: So today I have submitted my first article for review. We have calculated some interesting time indicators for Austria, such as value of leisure (VoL). Although, this work is partially done, it left me with a lot of questions. The used theoretical model takes into account only the official/paid work, but the domestic/unpaid work is not considered as a “real” work, as it does not generate any money. In our sample women work 8 hours less than men, but they are involved in 9 hours more of domestic work.
